mapper.select: select * from (select user_no, user_id, user_password, user_name, user_email, user_phone , user_status, user_birthday, user_nickname, user_joindate, user_point from usertable order by user_joindate desc) where rownum <= 5
select user_no, user_id, user_password, user_name, user_email, user_phone , user_status, user_birthday, user_nickname, user_joindate, user_point from usertable order by user_no desc
select user_no, user_id, user_password, user_name, user_email, user_phone, user_status, user_birthday , user_nickname, user_joindate, user_point from usertable where user_id=#{user_id}
select user_no, user_id, user_password, user_name, user_email, user_phone, user_status, user_birthday , user_nickname, user_joindate, user_point from usertable where user_no = #{userNo}
mapper.update: update usertable set user_point = #{userPoint} where user_no = #{userNo}
